meaning_str.bing:
n. 业余爱好
网络. 嗜好；兴趣；兴趣爱好

爱好；业余爱好；嗜好；消遣；<古>小型马；矮种马；燕隼

sogou-kaoyan.n: 兴趣; 爱好[出现1次)];竹马; 木马[出现0次)]

1.en: When many people hear the word 'hobby' they think of it as a small project that helps to pass the time, on a rainy afternoon.
1.cn: 许多人听到“爱好”这个词的时候，认为只不过是下雨天用来消遣的东西。

2.en: Richard Heeks has been taking the amazing photographs for the past few years and said it had become something of an obsessive hobby.
2.cn: RH在过去几年照了这些令人吃惊的照片，并且说他已沉迷于此爱好。

3.en: You might be able to pursue it within your current job, or do it as a side job or just as a hobby at first.
3.cn: 你可能在现在的工作中就能实践，或者把它作为兼职来做，或者仅仅从爱好出发。

0.en: I don't know. I was just working on it for my own. It was a hobby.
0.cn: 我是知道，我只是自己捣鼓一下，当个业余爱好而已。

1.en: But it already is your interest or hobby.
1.cn: 但它已经是你的兴趣爱好了。

2.en: Look, you don't have to practice a hobby. A hobby is a hobby.
2.cn: 知道吗，你不用训练什么爱好，爱好只是个爱好。

3.en: I thought we agreed that cello was my interest or hobby?
3.cn: 你们不是同意我可以把大提琴当作兴趣爱好吗？

4.en: Instead of desperately trying to keep this intercontinental relationship alive, you could use that time to take up a hobby. A hobby? Yes.
4.cn: 你与其花这些时间绝望地挣扎，费劲心思地保持这段跨洲恋情，你还不如找点别的兴趣爱好呢。兴趣爱好？没错。

5.en: Looks like our stray has a hobby. Another one of your fucking backstories?
5.cn: 看来失散的机器人有个爱好呢，又是因为你们那该死的背景故事吗？

6.en: Exactly, so why don't you take this chance to do something fun, find a hobby?
6.cn: 没错，所以你为什么不利用这次机会做点好玩的事情，找个爱好呢？

7.en: Hobby I used to have. The Battle of the Wilderness. I spent months building a model of it.
7.cn: 我以前的爱好，莽原之役，我花了几个月，造了一个模型。

8.en: Well, don't give up. You'll find that money somewhere. You really think so? No, but it's good that he has a hobby.
8.cn: 别放弃得太早。你总能找到钱的。你真这么想吗？才怪，但他现在有了个爱好是好事。

9.en: Not that wood shop, not those stupid little ships in the bottle. Nothing. Now he's happy. I mean, it's nice. He has a hobby.
9.cn: 连木材店和瓶内的小船也无法让他开心，现在他很开心，这样很好，他总算有个嗜好。

10.en: So when they ask you at the Oxford interview: What is your interest or hobby? you can say, the Cello. And you won't be lying.
10.cn: 所以当牛津大学在面试时问你"你有什么兴趣爱好?" 你就可以说 "拉大提琴" ，不算说谎啦。

11.en: Wow. Grandpa pig hobby is looking at the stars. Now who's for the first look? Me, me, me. Oh, the North Star. We sailor uses it to find our way home.
11.cn: 猪爷爷的爱好就是看星星。好了，那谁要来第一个看呢？我，我，我……我看到北极星呢。我们海员出海时就靠北极星找到回家的路。
